Texts.Chs: 把一枚稀有的^orange;幸运硬币^reset;带给^green;食品商店^reset; (位于^orange;科学前哨站^reset;)
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;rare Lucky Coin^reset; to the ^green;Food Shop^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 我到处都找遍了，还是搞不清楚傻逼凯文到底把我那该死的幸运硬币藏哪儿了。我^red;知道^reset;这很滑稽，他留下了一张字条，上面说他正在找人修理。可是真的，这只是一枚硬币而已。如果你偶然发现了一枚罕见的21世纪的地球的硬币...它是我的，请把它带给我。作为回报，我会^green;非常^reset;慷慨的。
Texts.Eng: I've looked everywhere and can't figure out where the heck Kevin hid my damned lucky coin. I ^red;know^reset; it was that buffoon. He left a note that claimed he was getting it repaired. A coin. Honestly. If you come across a rare 12th century Earth coin...it's mine. Please bring it to me. I'll be ^green;quite^reset; generous in return.

Texts.Chs: 我真的对你感激不尽。即使地球已经被毁灭，这枚硬币仍然是不可替代的。作为你的时间和勇气的交换，拿上这个吧。
Texts.Eng: The depths of my thanks cannot even be expressed. Replacing this is literally impossible now, what with Earth being slightly destroyed and all. Have this in exchange for your time and bravery.
